data.Name: Beyond Grace
data.Bio: bandcamp | facebook Band Vox: Andy Walmsley Guitar: Tim Yearsley Guitar: Chris Morley Bass: Andrew Workman Drums: Ed Gorrod Omni-Dimensional Death Metal Devastation from the collective unconscious of Nottingham, UK. Transformed and transmuted, shedding the weight of the past like a snake sheds its skin.Reborn in a new, more lethal form. We are Beyond Grace. Architects of omni-dimensional death metal devastation. The past years of touring and playing shows with the likes of Becoming The Archetype Read more on Last.fm
